Subject: S-OS-2008
Description: Would it be possible to exclude some computer accounts from this detection rule? We added some computer names in the section of the PingCastle.exe.config file however there are still counted in the S-OS-2008 rule.
Next_Steps__c:
Customer will try what we recommended.
Adding the SAMAccountName AND distinguishedName tags to the Honeypot setting in the pingcastle.exe config file.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
Need to exclude some computers accounts from detection rule S-OS-2008.


Resolution
Use the SAMAccountName AND distinguishedName tags in pingcastle.exe config file.
Something that is important to note is that you can do a maximum of 25.
